source.sqlReaderQuery:
---Extract the dimension data
SELECT 
    s.name AS SchemaName,
    t.name AS TableName
FROM 
    TescaOLTP.sys.tables t
INNER JOIN 
    TescaOLTP.sys.schemas s
ON 
    t.schema_id = s.schema_id
WHERE 
    t.name != 'PurchaseAnalysis'
	AND t.name != 'SalesAnalysis'
	AND t.name != 'sysdiagrams'
